air time.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the amount of time that a particular advertisement is seen on television, heard on radio etc
air time.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Banks are now allowed only 375 seconds of air time monthly on each television station.
air time.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the amount of time that a MOBILE PHONE user talks on his or her phone in a particular period of time
air time.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Cellular customers will pay normal air time charges for the service.
